description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' that inherits from 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink', utilizing Google Mock to facilitate unit testing by mocking various methods in these interfaces.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: Mock class for the WPEFramework plugin services, providing mock implementations of respective interfaces for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns version information of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL or path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature or component (identified by uint8_t) is supported.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with an ID and JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with message and details.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for the last state change.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with a string.
